code: import axios from"axios";const apiURL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL;export const isAuthenticate=()=>localStorage.getItem("jwt")?JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("jwt")):false;export const isAdmin=()=>localStorage.getItem("jwt")?JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("jwt")).user.role===1:false;export const loginReq=async _ref=>{let{email,password}=_ref;const data={email,password};try{let res=await axios.post(`${apiURL}/api/signin`,data);return res.data;}catch(error){console.log(error);}};export const signupReq=async _ref2=>{let{name,email,password,cPassword}=_ref2;const data={name,email,password,cPassword};try{let res=await axios.post(`${apiURL}/api/signup`,data);return res.data;}catch(error){console.log(error);}};
